data.name: TERA - Welcome Gift
data.detailed_description:
Lose yourself in the action-packed world of TERA and pick up a free starter pack!


In this breathtaking MMORPG you need to take fate in your own hands, carefully aiming your attacks and dodging enemy spells in the dynamic True Action Combat system. Seven races, twelve classes and countless dungeons, battlegrounds and powerful bosses – TERA pushes the boundaries of the MMO genre!

You must install TERA and create a character before you can use this package.

Contents of this bundle:

500x Fashion Coupon

Fashion Coupons can be exchanged for weapon and armor skins in the game.

1x Riding Skill: Obsidian Tail (7 Days)

Obsidian Tail is a jet-black wolf mount which you can summon and ride for 7 days.

3x Valiant Potion

Valiant Potions restore your health.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: The free starter pack contains handy items for TERA’s budding heroes, including a mount, health potions, plus Fashion Coupons for a weapon or armor decoration of your choice.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 (32-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 2130 / AMD FX 4130
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800 GT / Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX®: 9
  • Hard Drive: 45 GB HD space
  • Network: Broadband internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3570 / AMD FX 6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450 / Radeon HD 4890 1 GB
  • DirectX®: 9
  • Hard Drive: 55 GB HD space
  • Network: Broadband internet connection
